author: pbs.org
title: Home Fires: Episode 5 Preview Masterpiece
text: In the fifth episode, the women of Great Paxford face difficult decisions when their realities come crashing down around them. Home Fires, Episode 5 airs Sunday, November 1, 2015 at 8/7c on MASTERPIECE on PBS. #HomeFiresPBS
